Developer Terms of Use
des: Application for controlling KEC Smart’s Automation Products. KECSmart Provides an integrated solution for home automation. The KECSmart Automation device controls ON/OFF operations of light fittings, dimming controls, curtain, blinds, smart TV controls, plugs, heaters, irrigation equipment, water tank level controls etc. either voice commanding or mobile APP. Various routines, scenes, schedules can be programmed from KECSmart Mobile APP.
